definitions.definition: The act or process of extricating or disentangling ; a freeing from perplexities ; disentanglement .
Rescue of a trapped person in a vehicle or machinery .
The act of sending out or evolving.

main_definition: The act or process of extricating or disentangling ; a freeing from perplexities ; disentanglement .
secondary_definitions: ( public safety , emergency medicine ) Rescue of a trapped person in a vehicle or machinery .
The act of sending out or evolving.
